name: DeterministicUraniumProcessing
title: Deterministic Uranium Processing
author: Ben (fixes by garr89/150354839)
description: This mod adds another centrifuge recipe for uranium processing to remove the randomness factor without changing the vanilla balance of time, inputs or outputs.  It requires 10k uranium ore with a processing time of 12k seconds.  When finished it always outputs 7 x U235 and 993 x U238.
